programme.title: Mackenna's Gold, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: Shalako, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Shalako está conduzindo uma expedição de caça em uma zona selvagem no Novo México.

programme.title: Terra Bruta, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: Pela primeira vez, o lendário John Ford une-se à estrela James Stewart em - Terra Bruta, que relata a história tensa e emocionante de dois homens da lei que invadem o território dos Comanches para resgatar reféns cativos da tribo.

programme.title: Meu Nome è Ninguém, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: O honesto advogado Black Jack Gideon envolve-se na procura de um valioso e raro pônei japonês, que foi sequestrado, e por quem o bando de desertores renegados exige uma fabulosa quantia de resgate.

programme.title: Eagle's Wing, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, é um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se vê preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caçador de peles morre.

programme.title: Bravura Indômita, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Uma garota, Mattie Ross, contrata por 100 dólares um xerife caolho e beberrão, Rooster Cogburn, para que capture o assassino de seu pai.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoço. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e não terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Uma Aventura Selvagem, (2021, Adventure)
programme.desc: Dois irmãos são atacados por animais selvagens enquanto procuram por seu pai desaparecido no meio da floresta amazônica. Mas à medida em que continuam sua aventura, eles começam a perceber que existe algo muito mais sinistro por trás desses ataques.

programme.title: Infectados, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Após perder contato com um grupo de pesquisadores em uma ilha remota, uma corporação militar contrata um grupo de cientistas para descobrir o que deu errado.

programme.title: Missão: Pandora, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Após receber um pedido de socorro de uma embarcação, a Força Espacial Americana envia uma nave de resgate até Pandora, uma das luas de Saturno. Mas ao tentarem pousar, a tripulação descobre que o local é habitado por uma raça altamente evoluída.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporção ameaça destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extinção.

programme.title: O Assassino do Central Park, (2017, Horror)
programme.desc: Seis melhores amigos do ensino médio se reúnem para uma noite de diversão no Central Park. O que eles ainda não sabem é que um assassino mascarado está à solta no local, apenas esperando para colocar o seu plano de vingança em prática.

programme.title: Contágio em Alto Mar, (2019, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A tripulação de uma traineira do oeste da Irlanda, abandonada no mar, luta por suas vidas contra um parasita crescente em seu abastecimento de água.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Drama)
programme.desc: Dylan deixou seu passado sombrio de crimes e encontrou o amor de sua vida, Maria. Agora ele trabalha como pescador em águas abertas, mas o diretor da prisão local tem outros planos.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Quando um navio do Semestre no Mar é afundado por um tubarão de duas cabeças, os sobreviventes fogem para um atol deserto. Mas quando começa a inundar, os aliados não estão mais a salvo das mandíbulas duplas do monstro.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 6 Cabeças, (2018, Creature Features)
programme.desc: O que deveria ser um acampamento de treinamento de casamento em uma ilha remota se transforma no teste final de sobrevivência quando um tubarão de 6 cabeças começa a atacar a Praia.

programme.title: Não Adianta Rezar, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: A vida de Anna finalmente está entrando nos eixos. Traumatizada depois de um conturbado divórcio e de uma intensa luta para se livrar de sua dependência química, ela finalmente vai se mudar de vida.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis, (2019, Zombies)
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econômico na Croácia, o mundo mudou e agora a água é rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles terão que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: Maldita Aranha Assassina, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: A cidade de Los Angeles tem um grande problema pela frente. Uma aranha gigante acaba de escapar de um laboratório e está aterrorizando os moradores da cidade.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Creature Features)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Quando um experimento dá errado em um laboratório no meio do deserto, o local fica infestado de aranhas gigantes e ainda há pessoas presas lá dentro. Um grupo de operações de guerra chega para enfrentar o problema, mas não têm ideia do que enfrentarão ali

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Supernatural Sci-Fi)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis, (2019, Zombies)
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econômico na Croácia, o mundo mudou e agora a água é rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles terão que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela não tem intenção de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrás dos fragmentos da Jóia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que é uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vão ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Aumento da Energia Maligna; A Cabeça do Demônio

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o porão com a princesa e vai atrás dele. Agome encontra o cadáver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que está gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que estão destruindo campos. Eles encontram três macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Os Três Youkais do Deus Macaco

programme.title: Agome pega um resfriado e retorna aos dias atuais. Inuyasha está preocupado com ela. Ele reúne muitos alimentos nutritivos derrotando vários youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Confronto Entre Inuyasha e Hojo

programme.title: O irmão mais novo de Agome, Sota, se apaixonou por Hitomi, uma colega de classe. Inicialmente, ele pede a Inuyasha um conselho, mas no final, ele decide dizer a ela que a ama com um plano orquestrado por Agome.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Tesso, um youkai de rato que tem medo de gatos, se transforma em um curandeiro e persegue Kuroro. Inuyasha e seu grupo encontram aldeões que confundem Kirara com Kuroro e tentam expulsá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Espiritualista Mistérioso e a Kirara Negra

programme.title: Kikyo foi trazida de volta à vida por uma das técnicas secretas de Urasue. Ela conhece Monju, que está na mesma situação. Monju não tem almas suficientes.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Em uma certa aldeia, Inuyasha e sua equipe estão cercados por aldeões que não gostam de Mirok. Quando eles perguntam por que, eles dizem que Mirok tem feito muitas más ações. Mirok diz que ele é inocente, e suspeita que isso seja obra de um impostor...
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Inuyasha e sua equipe se encontram com Izumo, que está investigando o segredo da criação da Jóia. Eles ouvem que um youkai apareceu e vão investigar uma aldeia próxima.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 1

programme.title: Agome e os outros são sequestrados por youkais que estão usando falsas Jóias. Inuyasha vai salvá-los, mas Gyu-Oh fica em seu caminho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Os Criadores da Jóia de Quatro Almas: Parte 2

programme.title: Os insetos venenosos de Narak aparecem. Sesshomaru vai atrás deles. Enquanto isso, Jaken é picado por um inseto venenoso e está morrendo. Rin fica com ele e tenta salvá-lo. Ela vai ao campo de Jinenji para obter um fruto do Sennenso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Kirara desaparece e Sango está preocupada. Shippo deduz as razões de Kirara para desaparecer e culpa Inuyasha. Naquele momento, um som estrondoso vem da floresta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Agome é atraída para uma caverna por uma voz pedindo ajuda. Ao entrar ela encontra Kikyo, que não tem almas suficientes e enfraqueceu-se.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Kikyo e Kagome Sozinhas Numa Caverna

programme.title: Ginta e Hakkaku brigam com Kuga e acabam trabalhando separadamente. Ao fazer isso, eles encontram o grupo de Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Kuga e Sesshomaru, O Perigoso Confronto

programme.title: Garamaru, um youkai mariposa, prendeu Agome e os outros em um casulo e agora eles estão presos em seus pesadelos. Na vida real, Inuyasha está lutando sozinho.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Pesadelo Real! A Luta na Floresta do Desespero

programme.title: A neve está caindo fora de época. Mirok é sequestrado por Koyuki, uma mulher misteriosa. Agome e os outros ouvem de um caçador e sua esposa sobre um youkai da neve. Quando eles vão procurá-lo, eles encontram Sango, que se perdeu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Sete Anos Depois; As Neves Eternas

programme.title: Um ogro gigante chamado Kyokotsu aparece nas montanhas ao norte e devora outros youkais como a tribo de lobos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Lobos são Atacados por um Zumbi

programme.title: O Exército dos Sete foi trazido de volta à vida. O calvário enviado para derrotá-los é dizimado pelo segundo mais forte, Yakotsu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: A luta entre Yakotsu e Inuyasha é interrompida quando Mukotsu interfere. Mukotsu sequestra Agome para torná-la sua noiva. Mirok e Sango tentam salvá-la, mas o veneno de Mukotsu os impede de se mover.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango foram enfraquecidos pelo veneno de Mukotsu. Inuyasha tenta os ajudar.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: No templo, Inuyasha verifica se Agome e os outros estão seguros. Ele acaba confiando em Renkotsu e Ginkotsu o bombardeia. Inuyasha os enfrenta, mas Renkotsu rouba os fragmentos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Agome, Mirok e Sango pararam de respirar. Inuyasha procura pelo Exército dos Sete para vingá-los. Ele vê Sesshomaru e se certifica de que é uma ilusão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se aproximam da luz de um fragmento da Jóia que parece pertencer ao Exército, mas a luz não emana energia maligna. Suikotsu, um bom médico é o dono do fragmento...
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: A personalidade má de Suikotsu desperta e luta contra Inuyasha. Quando as crianças o chamam para voltar a ser quem ele era, Suikotsu sente uma forte dor. Bankotsu decidiu retirar-se da vila.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Há uma barreira ao redor do Monte Hakurei que purifica os youkais ou qualquer coisa maligna. Inuyasha e os outros pensam que Narak não pode estar se escondendo no Monte e vão procurar uma pista diferente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Líder do Exército dos Sete! Bankotsu Entra em Cena

programme.title: A batalha entre Bankotsu e Inuyasha começa. Enquanto isso, Sesshomaru chega ao Monte Hakurei.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Há uma ilha sagrada em um lago cercado por névoa. Hakushin, que se tornou um Buda vivo há cem anos, é venerado lá. Mas algo estranho acontece. O pai de um garoto chamado Shintaro vai investigar, mas ele não volta.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Barreira Energética da Ilha Hijiri

programme.title: Bankotsu sequestra Agome e os outros envolvidos em sua batalha contra Inuyasha. Inuyasha está fica irritado por ver que seus amigos estão se machucando.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Topo Sagrado e o Segredo da Múmia

programme.title: A barreira sagrada de Monte Hakurei impede que os youkais entrem nele. Hakushin ajuda Narak e coloca a barreira.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Monte Hakurei fica mais forte, e Kikyo é impedida de entrar em seu solo sagrado. Kikyo deixa a aldeia de Chiyo, mas vai atrás do Bankotsu para ver o que o Exército dos Sete está fazendo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Suikotsu não pode matar Chiyo e os outros. Após isso, Suikotsu e Jakotsu vão para dentro do local sagrado e esperam por Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Caesar leva Joseph até Veneza para conhecer sua mentora Lisa Lisa, que começa a treiná-lo com rigor para aprender a controlar seus poderes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa diz a Joseph que ele precisa da pedra chamada Super Aja para destruir os Homens do Pilar. Joseph e Caesar enfrentam outros mestres.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Caesar combinam seus poderes e enfrentam o Homem do Pilar que tomou o corpo de Suzi Q para roubar a Pedra Vermelha de Aja.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Stroheim luta com Kars em seu novo corpo mecânico. Joseph e Kars caem de um precipício na tentativa de conseguir a Pedra Vermelha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Caesar chega ao esconderijo do inimigo, e agora ele tem um novo tipo de ataque. Lisa Lisa revela seu passado a Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa e Joseph descobrem que Wamuu e Kars esperam por eles no hotel com uma centena de vampiros aliados, e ela elabora um plano inteligente para tirá-los dali.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma arena antiga, Joseph e Wamuu disputam uma corrida de bigas até a morte. Mesmo escolhendo a primeira arma, Joseph se vê em uma situação perigosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa a bandana de Caesar para se defender do ataque final de Wamuu. Lisa Lisa desafia Kars para um combate nas ruínas do templo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph tenta impedir que Lisa Lisa sofra uma queda mortal. Speedwagon revela detalhes sobre o passado de Lisa Lisa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A Pedra Vermelha deixa Kars praticamente invencível. Joseph planeja atrair Kars para um vulcão e acabar com ele por lá.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kars surge da lava derretida e ataca Joseph, que instintivamente segura a Pedra Vermelha para se proteger dos golpes do inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1987. Joseph vai até o Japão quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possuído por espíritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O homem possuído por um espírito maligno

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro ignora os protestos de Joseph e tenta usar seu Stand para impedir que DIO continue controlando o cérebro de Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A vitória parece certa quando Avdol usa seus poderes contra o assassino Polnareff, que tem a mente controlada por DIO. Quem será o vencedor desta batalha?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados viajam até Singapura pelo mar. Um Stand com usuário desconhecido ataca Jotaro assim que um passageiro clandestino é encontrado no navio.

programme.sub-title: O Imperador e o Enforcado – Parte 2

programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seu grupo ultrapassam um carro em uma estrada nas montanhas. Logo em seguida, Polnareff vê um caminhão no sentido contrário. Será que vai dar tempo de desviar?
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados desconfiam que exista um Stand por perto quando encontram um cadáver em uma tranquila cidade do Paquistão.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Polnareff é atacado por um exército de zumbis após descobrir que a velhinha responsável pelo hotel é uma usuária de Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Jotaro e seus aliados enfrentam um assassino cruel, que segue as ordens de DIO para matar sem um pingo de hesitação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kakyoin e Polnareff descobrem um Stand inimigo capaz de atacar as células cerebrais quando mandam seus Stands para a cabeça de Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Adventure)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se às forças do mal no outro mundo de São Petersburgo.

programme.title: Adventure Boyz, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando o maior castelo da Inglaterra é roubado por um notório chefe do crime, a última coisa que ele e sua gangue esperam é ter que enfrentar Sam e Jake, dois garotos em suas bicicletas.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Adventure)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Jungle - Protegendo a Selva, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: Dipankar Nair administra um santuário de elefantes, mas as coisas começam a ir mal, pois caçadores estão matando elefantes por causa do marfim das presas dos animais.

programme.title: Missao Quase Impossível, (2010, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Império Proibido, (2015, Adventure)
programme.desc: No início do século 18, o cartógrafo Jonathan Green empreende uma viagem científica da Europa para o Oriente. Passando pela Transilvânia e cruzando as montanhas dos Cárpatos, ele encontra uma pequena vila perdida na floresta.

programme.title: Em Nome do Rei: A Última Missão, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um assassino moderno, é contratado para uma tarefa final: sequestrar as filhas de uma Família real européia. As coisas vão à loucura quando descobrimos que ele escolheu voltar à Idade Média e trazer de volta a ordem a um reino no caos.

programme.title: Adventure Boyz, (2019, Adventure)
programme.desc: Quando o maior castelo da Inglaterra é roubado por um notório chefe do crime, a última coisa que ele e sua gangue esperam é ter que enfrentar Sam e Jake, dois garotos em suas bicicletas.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: A Lenda do Mestre Chinês, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em uma lenda chinesa e gira em torno de um jovem estudante (Raymond Lam) que se apaixona por uma bela mulher (Huang Shengyi), sem saber que ela é uma cobra branca que assumiu a forma humana.

programme.title: Dragões para Sempre, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Jackie é contratado para defender uma empresa acusada de poluir as águas da cidade. Ao descobrir que eles produzem drogas, Jackie decide mudar de lado.​

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Vingança Fatal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um ex-fuzileiro naval e mestre de artes marciais busca vingança em uma cidade dominada pela Yakuza.

programme.title: Aliança Mortal, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Um grande carregamento de drogas desaparece entre a fronteira Canadá-Estados Unidos. Os traficantes de drogas que o procuram obrigam um guarda florestal, um ex-membro das Forças Especiais, a ajudá-los a encontrar a droga.

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: The Best Years of Our Lives, (1946, War)
programme.desc: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

programme.title: The Train, (1964, War)
programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: Casino Royale, (1967, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this spoof, the heads of the allied spy forces call Sir James Bond out of retirement to fight the power of SMERSH.

programme.title: The April Fools, (1969, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Howard Brubaker (Jack Lemmon) is a newly promoted man trapped in a loveless marriage. Catherine's (Catherine Deneuve) marriage would be ideal if her husband wasn't a womanizer. Soon the pair find themselves falling in love, and facing their spouses.

programme.title: That Touch of Mink, (1962, Comedy)
programme.desc: Love arrives with a splash when a handsome and eligible tycoon and a beautiful working woman meet over a curbside mud puddle. He’s enchanted by her small town ways, she’s captivated by his romantic, debonair manner.

programme.title: Blue Hawaii, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: His mother (Angela Lansbury) expects him to climb the corporate ladder. But Elvis would rather wear an aloha shirt than a white collar, so he goes to work as a tour guide. Lucky Elvis: his first customers are a car full of cuties.

programme.title: Girls! Girls! Girls!, (1962, Musical)
programme.desc: Elvis plays a charter-boat skipper who helps tourists land the big ones. Of course, plenty of beautiful girls want to land Elvis. But there’s something Elvis likes almost as much as romance–a boat!

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol, (2011, Action)
programme.desc: Agent Ethan Hunt and his elite team go underground after a bombing implicates them as terrorists. While trying to clear their name, the team uncovers a plot to start a nuclear war.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Scream 4, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro – but it’s a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: Scream, (2022, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Twenty-five years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, a terrifying new killer resurrects the Ghostface mask.

programme.title: Scream VI, (2023, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: The four Woodsboro survivors have moved to New York City for a fresh start. Just as they begin to feel safe again, they receive that infamous call. Ghostface reemerges more brutal and relentless than ever, stopping at nothing to hunt them down.

programme.title: Scream, (2022, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Twenty-five years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, a terrifying new killer resurrects the Ghostface mask.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: One fierce battle ends in Cioccolata’s defeat, but another unfolds after Secco listens to Cioccolata’s revealing final voicemail. Bucciarati sinks into an intense underground struggle to stop Secco from reaching the secret stationed at the Colosseum.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: The curtains are down on his skirmish with Secco, but Bucciarati must race against time to reach the Colosseum as he realizes his body is nearing the end of the line. Unfortunately, he’s not the only one who catches on to his deteriorating condition.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Key to defeating the Boss in hand, Polnareff waits for Bucciarati and crew. But the one who appears before him first is none other than the Boss of the Passione himself, Diavolo. The tides may not be the only things shifting in the battle yet to come.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Pierced by the arrow, Silver Chariot transforms into Chariot Requiem, its new power swapping the souls of all living creatures nearby. Realizing the dangers of the arrow in the wrong hands, Giorno and crew scramble to get ahold of it before Diavolo does.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Grotesque disfigurations begin to emerge from the soul-swapped bodies as Chariot Requiem’s frenzy rages on. Bucciarati and crew need to take back the arrow and fast. However, Giorno has a terrifying revelation, stopping everyone in their tracks.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Solving the mystery of Requiem, Diavolo takes control of Trish’s soul and steals the arrow. Attacks do nothing against Emperor Crimson’s time leaps and Eulogy’s predictions. But just as Diavolo is about to pierce his own Stand with the arrow...

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Righteous actions born of truth shall never be destroyed. Piercing Golden Wind with the arrow, Giorno draws the final battle against Diavolo to a close. And Diavolo, robbed of the mercy of death, spirals violently into an “end” that never ends.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Months before meeting Giorno, Bucciarati and gang help a local florist chisel out the truth behind his daughter’s apparent suicide. Mista is assigned to track down her lover, whose ties with destiny had unwittingly cast a light upon Bucciarati’s fate.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon departs on a journey to take the Hunter Exam and meets Leorio and Kurapika who also want to be Hunters.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: If Gon, Leorio and Kurapika cannot answer an old woman's question correctly, they will be immediately disqualified.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Escorted by the Kiriko the trio finally arrive at the exam site.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The exam for the First Phase consists of following Satotz, the proctor to the site of the Second Phase.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Misty wetlands await the participants as they emerge from the long tunnel. Visibility is poor and various monsters lie in wait.
programme.sub-title: Hisoka x Is So x Sneaky

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Proctors Menchi and Buhara's test consists of preparing a dish that will satisfy the palate of Gourmet Hunters.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Netero challenges Gon and Killua to a simple game. If they win, they earn the right to become Hunters.
programme.sub-title: Showdown x On x The Airship

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: The airship arrives at the site of the Third Phase. To pass this test, entrants must reach the base of the tower within 72 hours.
programme.sub-title: Decision x By x Majority Rule?

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon chooses the challenge where the person whose candle goes out first loses, but finds his candle has been tampered with

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Leorio loses patience as Kurapika refuses to deliver the final blow. An uneasy mood settles over the five as time continues to tick away.
programme.sub-title: The Trick x To x The Trick

programme.title: Death Note: Rebirth
programme.desc: Brilliant but bored high school student Light Yagami suddenly finds himself holding the power of life and death in his hand, the power of the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Dreamgirls, (2006, Musical)
programme.desc: With showstopping performances by a star-studded cast, Dreamgirls soars with the amazing story of three female singers who learn that anything is possible when you hold on to your dreams.

programme.title: Norbit, (2007, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Murphy stars as mild-mannered Norbit, who gets a second chance at love with his childhood sweetheart, Kate. However, obstacles may make this romance slightly more difficult than expected.

programme.title: Harlem Nights, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: In the waning days of Prohibition, Sugar Ray and his adopted son, Quick, run a speakeasy called Club Sugar Ray. Gangster Bugsy Calhoune pays corrupt cop Phil Cantone to close Club Sugar Ray down.

programme.title: Mo' Money, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: You can never be too rich...or too funny. Comedian Damon Wayans brings his rogue's gallery of outrageous characters to this action-filled comedy about a con artist who tries to go straight, but keeps getting pulled in the wrong direction.

programme.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead, (2024, Comedy)
programme.desc: Tanya finds her summer plans canceled when her mom jets off for a last-minute retreat and the elderly babysitter who arrives at her door unexpectedly passes away.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: City Hunter, (1993, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Extremely silly comedy about a self-indulgent private investigator who winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists, and scarce food.

programme.title: Crime Story [English Subtitled], (1993, Action)
programme.desc: A Special Agent is assigned to protect a wealthy business magnate. However, when the businessman is kidnapped in a daring ambush, he teams up with a seasoned detective to crack the case. But soon he discovers the case isn't that simple.

programme.title: Red Cliff, (2015, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Legendary action cinema master John Woo and international superstar Tony Leung reunite for the first time since the 1992 classic HARD BOILED with this epic historical drama based on a legendary 208 A.D. battle that heralded the Han Dynasty's end.

programme.title: Hero ("Ying Xiong"), (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Acclaimed by critics and loved by audiences around the world, Jet Li, Maggie Cheung, and Donnie Yen star in this Oscar and Golden Globe-nominated action-packed epic, in which a fearless warrior rises up to defy an empire and unite a nation.

programme.title: Seven Swords, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Seven exceptional warriors band together to protect a village from bounty hunters.

programme.title: Kill Zone, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: An inspector and his unit are after a crime boss and are willing to capture him at all costs. The crime boss enlists his top henchmen to end their dirty schemes.

programme.title: Flash Point, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: The creators of Kill Zone take action to the next level with a breakthrough combination of hard-hitting mixed martial arts battles and nail-biting tension.

programme.title: Ip Man, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Ip Man is the award-winning film adaptation about the life story of Ip Man, the grandmaster of the Wing Chun style of kung fu and sifu of legendary martial arts superstar, Bruce Lee.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Enter the world of 1970s TV news, where Ron Burgundy and his loyal Channel 4 News Team are San Diego's #1 rated news source. All is well in their male-dominated world of news until rising star reporter Veronica Corningstone turns it upside down.

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: The wait is over, America -- Ron Burgundy is back! After losing his job, Ron reassembles the news team and squares off against a new rival in the comedy that critics are calling one of the funniest movies of the year!

programme.title: Mac & Devin Go to High School, (2012, Comedy)
programme.desc: Rappers Snoop Doog and Wiz Khalifa team up to create this ultimate stoner comedy with a star-studded hip hop soundtrack.

programme.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy, (2004, Comedy)
programme.desc: Enter the world of 1970s TV news, where Ron Burgundy and his loyal Channel 4 News Team are San Diego's #1 rated news source. All is well in their male-dominated world of news until rising star reporter Veronica Corningstone turns it upside down.

programme.title: Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues, (2013, Comedy)
programme.desc: The wait is over, America -- Ron Burgundy is back! After losing his job, Ron reassembles the news team and squares off against a new rival in the comedy that critics are calling one of the funniest movies of the year!

programme.title: Blades of Glory, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two figure skating rivals are banned from the sport after a brawl over the gold medal. Joining forces, they find a loophole in the rules that allows them to skate again... as a pair!

programme.title: Zoolander, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Three-time male model of the year, Derek Zoolander, is devastated when he loses the title to newbie Hansel. After the news, Mugatu's fashion empire brainwashes Derek into being an assassin.

programme.title: Zoolander 2, (2016, Comedy)
programme.desc: When the world's most beautiful people are in danger, former models Derek and Hansel are recruited for a top secret mission to defeat the criminal mastermind Mugatu. Prepare for a dangerously sexy adventure where looks really can kill.

programme.title: Urban Cowboy, (1980, Romance)
programme.desc: A West Texas farm boy goes to the big city where he rides a mechanical bull, meets his future wife, and encounters the antagonism of an ex-con

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Some Kind of Wonderful, (1987, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: In this story from legendary filmmaker John Hughes, Keith, Watts and Amanda prove that you've got to risk a broken heart in order to find your one true love. This unforgettable romantic comedy has laughs, romance and is truly Some Kind of Wonderful.

programme.title: Pretty In Pink, (1986, Romance)
programme.desc: She’s a high school girl from the wrong side of town. He’s the wealthy heartthrob who asks her to the prom. But as fast as their romance builds, it’s threatened by the painful reality of peer pressure.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral, (1994, Romance)
programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Tom Hanks and Meg Ryan star in an enchanting romance about a widower whose son convinces him to find new love and the woman who answers his call.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romance)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Drive Hard, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Former race car driver traded the winner's circle for a 9 to 5 job, but his life shifts into overdrive when he is hijacked to be getaway driver in a $9 million heist.

programme.title: The General's Daughter, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: There's the right way, the wrong way and the Army way. But there's no way military investigator Paul Brenner is going to participate in a cover-up when Fort MacCallum officials try to hide the motive behind the murder of a female officer.

programme.title: Payback, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

programme.title: Donnie Darko (Theatrical Cut), (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping a bizarre accident, a troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Pierce, a paramedic, is on the brink of madness from too many years of saving and losing lives. One fateful night, Frank meets Mary Burke, the daughter of a man Frank tried to save. Together, Frank and Mary confront the ghosts of the past.

programme.title: The General's Daughter, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: There's the right way, the wrong way and the Army way. But there's no way military investigator Paul Brenner is going to participate in a cover-up when Fort MacCallum officials try to hide the motive behind the murder of a female officer.

programme.title: Ronin, (1998, Adventure)
programme.desc: When an international team of former Cold War intelligence adversaries meet in a Warehouse, their venture of friendship, intrigue and betrayal has just begun.

programme.title: Collateral, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Vincent is a cool, calculating contract killer at the top of his game. Max is a cabbie with big dreams and no results. On this fateful night, Max has to transport Vincent on his next job - one night, five stops, five hits and a getaway.

programme.title: The Boy Downstairs, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: Diana (Zosia Mamet, "The Kids are All Right") moves back to New York City after a few years abroad and finds the perfect apartment. Yet on the first night in her new home, she discovers that her ex-boyfriend lives in the apartment below hers.

programme.title: A Home of Our Own, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: A single mother leaves Los Angeles with her six children and moves to Idaho. She buys a broken-down house without a roof, doors or windows. Weathering natural disasters and personal conflict, they rebuild the house and their lives.

programme.title: The Whistleblower, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: This ripped-from-the-headlines thriller is inspired by actual events. Kathy Bolkovac (Rachel Weisz), a Nebraskan police officer, takes a job as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia.

programme.title: Pieces of April, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: A head strong young woman, who has alienated her parents is forced to confront their troubled relationship when she learns that her mother, is dying of cancer.

programme.title: Salmon Fishing In The Yemen, (2012, Romance)
programme.desc: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

programme.title: The Artist, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: Hollywood 1927. George Valentin is a very successful silent movie star, but the arrival of talking pictures could mark the end of his career.

programme.title: Not Easily Broken, (2009, Romance)
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling novel by T.D. Jakes, a couple's strength and faith are tested after the wife is injured in a car crash and her husband becomes attracted to another woman.

programme.title: South Central, (1992, Drama)
programme.desc: Bobby is trapped in a cycle of hatred, incarceration and bloodshed. He is a new man upon his release from prison, but South Central has gone from bad to worse. Now only Bobby can save his son from the violent and doomed future of a gang member.

programme.title: All the President's Men, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Redford and Dustin Hoffman star as Washington Post reporters whose investigation of a hotel room break-in uncovers the greatest political scandal in United States history and leads to the downfall of President Richard Nixon.

programme.title: One-Eyed Jacks, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: After robbing a Mexican bank, Dad Longworth takes the loot and leaves his partner Rio to be captured but Rio escapes and searches for Dad in California.

programme.title: Salvation, The, (2015, Western)
programme.desc: The mighty Mads Mikkelsen unleashes a maelstrom of bloodshed in the Wild West in this white-knuckle tale of revenge, co-starring Eva Green.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys: Bad Blood, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: In this bloody long-standing feud, two families seek vengeance against each other as they unmercifully attempt to destroy each other's loved ones.

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More, (1967, Western)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of her…earning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In a future world, humans share aspects of their lives with companion robots called Mechas. But when an advanced prototype robot child named David is programmed to show unconditional love, his human family isn't prepared for the consequences.

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest, (1999, Adventure)
programme.desc: Nearly twenty years after the cult TV show Galaxy Quest was cancelled, the alumni cast is asked for help by an alien species in order to save the universe.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence, (2001, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In a future world, humans share aspects of their lives with companion robots called Mechas. But when an advanced prototype robot child named David is programmed to show unconditional love, his human family isn't prepared for the consequences.

programme.title: Super 8, (2011, Adventure)
programme.desc: In the summer of 1979, a group of friends in a small Ohio town witness a catastrophic train crash while making a Super 8 movie and soon suspect that it was not an accident.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: The Turtles are back to battle a bigger threat alongside April O'Neil and vigilante Casey Jones. As they prepare to take on supervillain Shredder and his henchmen, Bebop and Rocksteady, they find themselves facing an even greater evil: the sinister Krang.

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: The story of a pro quarterback and former college champion and coach are asked to put together a football team of inmates to take on the guards while doing their time in prison.

programme.title: Capote, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: In 1959, Truman Capote learns about the horrific and senseless murder of a family of four in Kansas. As he digs deeper into the story, he is inspired to expand the project into what would be his greatest work, In Cold Blood.

programme.title: Brotherhood of the Wolf, (2001, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: In 18th-century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his Native American friend Mani are sent to the Gevaudan province at the king's behest to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.

programme.title: The 4:30 Movie, (2024, Comedy)

programme.title: The Longest Yard, (2005, Comedy)

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Stomp the Yard: Homecoming, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: Succubus, (2024, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, (1988, Horror)
programme.desc: Ever since homicidal maniac Jason Voorhees got trapped in chains at the bottom of Crystal Lake, the nearby summer camp has operated without a hitch... without a murder. But one of this season’s happy campers has brought along a deadly secret.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan, (1989, Horror)
programme.desc: The Big Apple’s in big trouble, as indestructible psycho-fiend Jason Voorhees hits the road to New York City - and paints the town “red.”

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Take a Chance
programme.desc: Shark’s trying to control Rio’s life and she’s not taking it anymore! Will this family feud turn into a feeding frenzy for Shark, or will Rio put her brother’s winning streak on ice?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: An Imperfect Couple: Part 1
programme.desc: The gang’s dressed up as their favorite monsters for the school’s fun fair, but when Anna crashes the festivities, the party ends for Yuma!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: An Imperfect Couple: Part 2
programme.desc: Being Anna’s boyfriend is a dangerous job, but when Anna’s teacher plays a Barian card, Yuma finds out just how dangerous it is!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Enter Vector
programme.desc: Yuma is confronted by an enemy from the past who casts a dark shadow on his future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Search for Shadows
programme.desc: Yuma embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Ray from the evil clutches of Vector!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Shadows of Deception
programme.desc: The Barians are on the attack, and Yuma is ready to risk everything to rescue Ray! But when Vector reveals a terrifying truth, Yuma's dream of saving Ray turns into a nightmare!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sinister Shadows
programme.desc: Still reeling from Vector’s revelation that he and Ray Shadows are one and the same, Yuma looks to make Vector pay for all his lies! But with Astral learning of Yuma’s own deceptions, will Yuma have to face Vector alone?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Shadows End
programme.desc: All the cards are on the table! Can our heroes defeat the dark and dangerous Barians, or will they end up one card short?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Duel in Ruins: Part 1
programme.desc: An ancient Barian deity awakens to add a terrifying new twist to Barian World’s agenda against Astral!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Duel in Ruins: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma is put to the ultimate test when a Number Guardian traps his friends and forces him to battle for their freedom!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Dark Mist Rises: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma searches for the second Mythyrian Number and ends up finding an old nemesis who is out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Dark Mist Rises: Part 2
programme.desc: Every time Astral attacks, he puts Yuma’s life in danger, but if he doesn’t attack, he’s a goner himself! It’s a no-win situation in the cruelest duel yet!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Barian Vengeance: Part 1
programme.desc: Alito’s back in the ring to take down Yuma, but a fair fight isn’t in the cards when Alito has one of Yuma’s friends in his corner!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Barian Vengeance: Part 2
programme.desc: Nistro’s under Alito’s control, and it’s up to Yuma and Dextra to free him! Can this tag team duo bob and weave their way past Alito’s attacks, or will this Barian knock out any chances they have of winning?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Put to the Test: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Put to the Test: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Furry Fury
programme.desc: After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there’s more to Girag than meets the eye – like a red nose and whiskers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Sea of Troubles: Part 1
programme.desc: It’s rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Sea of Troubles: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle beneath the ocean reaches new depths of danger when Shark comes face to face with the Number Guardian, Abyss!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A World of Chaos: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A World of Chaos: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between our two heroes and Number 96 comes to a shocking conclusion that leaves only one person standing!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Memory Thief: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Memory Thief: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Trey team up to take down a bugged out Barian who likes to munch on memories! Can Yuma and Trey swat down this winged menace before he swoops in to drain their brains?

programme.desc: With Vector’s patience for failure fading fast, Mr. Heartland begs for a final chance to beat Yuma! Desperate to deliver, Heartland deploys his most dangerous duelist to date, a treacherous Barian armed with toxic tentacles!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Now or Never: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s all set to travel across the stars to save Astral, but an unexpected pest pops by to plunder Yuma’s plans!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Now or Never: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch! But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner’s attacks!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Mission: Astral World: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Mission: Astral World: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Mission: Astral World: Part 4
programme.desc: With Astral’s fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World’s Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Assimilation: Part 1
programme.desc: To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers. When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang’s heels!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Assimilation: Part 2
programme.desc: With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down! Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?

programme.title: Luffy’s gigantic attack on Lucci takes a devastating toll on his body, Robin rejoins the fight, and the rest of the Straw Hats struggle to survive underwater!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious mermaid appears? As consciousness fades away…

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from what appears to be a mermaid, the Straw Hats find themselves reunited aboard an escape vessel, but the fate of Luffy and the Franky Family is yet to be determined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cannon fire sinks the island! Franky's lamentation!

programme.title: Luffy pushes his body to the breaking point in his battle with Lucci, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to fight off a fleet of Marines until their captain returns – if he ever does.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Wait for luffy! Mortal combat on the bridge of hesitation!

programme.title: Luffy lies battered and badly beaten, but Usopp’s desperate pleas inspire the rubber-man to mount one final, furious attack on Rob Lucci!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fists full of emotion! Luffy unleashes gatling with all his might!

programme.title: With their leader crippled by exhaustion and their escape ship destroyed, the Straw Hats find themselves with only one treacherous option: throwing themselves into the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: From the sea, a friend arrives! The straw hats share the strongest bond!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are rescued by the unexpected arrival of a dear old friend, but they’ll have to avoid a barrage of deadly cannonballs in order to survive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone makes a great escape! The road to victory is for the pirates!

programme.title: The Straw Hats bid a tearful farewell to the brave little ship that was their home for so very many adventures. Rest in peace, Merry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Thank you, merry! Snow falls over the parting sea!

programme.title: The Straw Hats get some much needed rest and relaxation, Franky makes a big announcement, and Vice Admiral Garp tracks down his grandson!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Peace interrupted! A navy vice admiral with a fist of love!

programme.title: Luffy’s friends are shocked to learn that his grandpa is a marine hero, but that’s nothing compared to how surprised they’ll be by his father’s true identity!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The strongest family? Luffy's father revealed!

programme.title: Luffy gets the chance to catch up with his old friend Coby, Nami does some serious snooping, and Robin is paid a chilling visit from a terrifying face from her past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Its name is the new world! The fate of the grand line!

programme.title: Shanks visits Whitebeard with a serious request, Franky and Iceberg begin construction on a ship for the Straw Hats, and news spreads of the events at Enies Lobby.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shanks makes a move! The linchpin to the reckless era!

programme.title: Luffy and Chopper risk their lives to help a heartbroken young girl track down her long lost pet!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A girl in search of her yagara! Great search in the city of water!

programme.title: Zoro’s day takes a turn for the crazy when his search for a new sword is derailed by a couple of meddling orphans!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mothers are strong! Zoro's hectic household chores!

programme.title: Sanji spends the day with a very old chef who teaches him the secret of packing amazing flavor into each and every dish!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji's shock! Mysterious old man and his super yummy cooking!

programme.title: Franky and Iceberg stay up all night on a mission to finish a new ship for the Straw Hats, but the first light of day brings troubling news!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everyone finally has a bounty! A pirate group worth over 600 million!

programme.title: With their new ship completed, Luffy and the gang get ready to set sail, but first, they’ll have to steal some underpants in order to secure the services of a shipwright!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The king of animals that overlooks the sea! The dream ship magnificently completed!

programme.title: A series of flashbacks to his younger days – and some painful persuasion by Robin – help Franky make the difficult decision to leave his friends and go to sea with the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Goodbye my dear underlings! Franky departs!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats are ready for their next adventure, but before they can move on they must await the return of Usopp – and avoid a barrage of cannonballs courtesy of Garp!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Departing the city of water! Usopp mans up and brings closure to the duel!

programme.title: The Straw Hats’ new ship gets a name, and Franky shows off some of its special features as the gang goes sky high to avoid being sunk by the marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Wanted posters make it around the world! Celebration in their hometowns as the ship moves forward!

programme.title: Ace and Blackbeard go toe-to-toe in an epic clash of Devil Fruit powers that pits fire against darkness – and threatens to destroy an entire island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The most heinous power! Blackbeard's darkness attacks ace!

programme.title: Luffy and his mates cross paths with a ragged gang of sailors. The Straw Hats are quick to offer assistance, but their new friends may be up to no good!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Mysterious Band of Pirates! Sunny and the Dangerous Trap!

programme.title: The Straw Hats discover that their fishermen friends are actually pirates, but Chopper refuses to abandon a very sick patient.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sunny in a Pinch! Roar, Secret Superspeed Mecha!

programme.title: The captain of the Phoenix Pirates loses his will to fight, and the Straw Hats get trapped in a field of icebergs by some figure skating bounty hunters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Dream Sinking in the New World! The Disillusioned Pirate, Puzzle!

programme.title: Nami and Franky take a spin in the shark sub, Usopp and Sanji have a run in with a flock of deadly penguins, and Puzzle can no longer hide the fact that he's alive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Assassins Attack! The Great Battle on Ice Begins!

programme.title: Robin is shocked by her encounter with an adorable bounty hunter, Franky and Nami get trapped in a frozen shark, and Luffy's quest to recapture his flag sends him sinking toward the bottom of the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Staw Hat’s Hard Battles! A Pirate Soul Risking It All for the Flag!

programme.title: Luffy battles a set of magnetic twins, Sanji and Usopp fall victim to a pair of figure skating lovebirds, and Zoro has a drink with the man who stole the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hot Full Throttle! The Twin’s Magnetic Power Drawing Near!

programme.title: Robin's cola care package helps spring her friends from an icy prison, and Luffy's bold words inspire a battered and beaten pirate to keep fighting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mansion of Great Chaos! The Enraged Don and the Captured Crew!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his battle with the magnetic twins, Chopper uses a rumble ball in his battle with a hockey player – and Robin tries to recover the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Phoenix! The Dream of the Pirate Flag Sworn to a Friend!

programme.title: Luffy battles an opponent who's too hot to handle, Robin gets attacked by a jungle, and Chopper makes a heroic dash for the Straw Hat flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Red Hot Decisive Battle! Luffy vs. The Scorching Don!

programme.title: Luffy's red-hot battle with Papa threatens to destroy the entire icy island, and the rest of the Straw Hats need a little help from a former enemy to recover their flag!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Waiting in the New World! Farewell to the Brave Pirates!

programme.title: The most adorable hero the world has ever known – Chopperman – must battle a hideously evil villain to regain control of his favorite television station!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chopperman to the Rescue! Protect the TV Station by the Shore!

programme.title: While sailing through haunted waters, the Straw Hats encounter a ghost ship that's home to a walking, talking skeleton!

programme.sub-title: THE MYSTERIOUS SKELETON FLOATING THROUGH THE FOG! VENTURE INTO THE DEVIL'S SEA!

programme.title: The Straw Hats attempt to unravel the mystery of their new comrade, but the skeleton's sad story is interrupted by a ghastly landing at the haunted island of Thriller Bark!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE JOY OF SEEING PEOPLE! THE GENTLEMAN SKELETON'S TRUE IDENTITY!

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Mad Max, (1980, Action)
programme.desc: Max and the gang's worlds converge when the gang wants Max as badly as he wants them, especially after they target him for the death of their former leader.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Action)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.desc: Cavalry scouts Gene Autry & Pat Buttram are ordered to break up a ring which uses raids to cover up its activities. Carolina Cotton assists Gene and Pat, while seeking revenge against the gang leader.

programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.desc: A lonely socialite masquerades as a maid and meets an unpretentious, plain-spoken cowboy who is unaware of her true identity.

programme.title: The Return of A Man Called Horse, (1976, Western)
programme.desc: Richard Harris stars in this superior sequel which follows the plight of a horribly wronged tribe of Sioux Indians and the white man who would join in their revenge.

programme.title: The Gunfighter, (1950, Western)

programme.title: Last Train From Gun Hill, (1959, Western)

programme.title: Down to Earth, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Struggling black comic Lance Barton (Chris Rock) knows what it's like to die on stage. But when his life takes an unexpected turn - straight to heaven - Lance is sure there's been a mistake.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Baby Boy, (2001, Drama)
programme.desc: Jody is a 20-year-old African American in South Central L.A. who is trying to live large but doesn't have a job. Growing up is tough on Jody, but a series of events force him to learn lessons about living, loving and surviving as a man in the hood.

programme.title: Down to Earth, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Struggling black comic Lance Barton (Chris Rock) knows what it's like to die on stage. But when his life takes an unexpected turn - straight to heaven - Lance is sure there's been a mistake.

programme.title: First Sunday, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two bumbling criminals discover they haven't got a prayer when they attempt to steal from the local church.

programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.desc: The suave Joe and his hypochondriac partner Terry have escaped from prison. Cutting a swath from Oregon through California, these fugitives rob banks in order to finance their scheme for a new life south of the Border.
